TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Bitmap extends System.Drawing.Image
Public NotInheritable Class Bitmap Inherits Image
public ref class Bitmap sealed : System::Drawing::Image

summary.span: 封裝 GDI+ 點陣圖，這個點陣圖是由圖形影像的像素資料及其屬性所組成。

span.span: Encapsulates a GDI+ bitmap, which consists of the pixel data for a graphics image and its attributes.

summary.span: 是用來處理像素資料所定義影像的物件。

span.span: A is an object used to work with images defined by pixel data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 點陣圖是由圖形影像像素資料及其屬性所組成。A bitmap consists of the pixel data for a graphics image and its attributes. 有許多的標準格式的點陣圖儲存至檔案。There are many standard formats for saving a bitmap to a file. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 支援下列檔案格式： BMP、 GIF、 EXIF、 JPG、 PNG 和 TIFF。supports the following file formats: BMP, GIF, EXIF, JPG, PNG and TIFF. 如需有關支援之格式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 類型的點陣圖](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/types-of-bitmaps.md)。For more information about supported formats, see [Types of Bitmaps](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/types-of-bitmaps.md). 您可以從檔案、 資料流及其他來源建立映像，使用其中一種建構函式並將它們儲存至資料流或檔案系統與方法。You can create images from files, streams, and other sources by using one of the constructors and save them to a stream or to the file system with the method. 映像會藉由繪製到螢幕或記憶體方法的物件。Images are drawn to the screen or to memory by using the method of the object. 如需使用映像檔案的相關主題的清單，請參閱 < [ 使用影像、 點陣圖、 圖示和中繼檔](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/working-with-images-bitmaps-icons-and-metafiles.md)。For a list of topics about working with image files, see [Working with Images, Bitmaps, Icons, and Metafiles](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/working-with-images-bitmaps-icons-and-metafiles.md). > [!NOTE] > 類別不能存取跨應用程式定義域。The class is not accessible across application domains. 例如，如果您建立動態和該網域，然後傳遞這些物件會回到主要的應用程式定義域中建立數個筆刷、 畫筆與點陣圖，您可以成功使用畫筆和筆刷。For example, if you create a dynamic and create several brushes, pens, and bitmaps in that domain, then pass these objects back to the main application domain, you can successfully use the pens and brushes. 不過，如果您呼叫方法來繪製封送處理，您會收到下列例外狀況。However, if you call the method to draw the marshaled , you receive the following exception. > > 遠端處理型別 」 System.Drawing.Image"上找不到欄位 「 原生映像 」。Remoting cannot find field "native image" on type "System.Drawing.Image". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構的新從檔案中，使用和方法來將影像重新著色。The following code example demonstrates how to construct a new from a file, using the and methods to recolor the image. 它也會使用， ，和屬性。It also uses the , , and properties. 這個範例設計來搭配包含 Windows Forms ， ，並名為`Label1`， `PictureBox1`，和`Button1`分別。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Forms that contains a , , and named `Label1`, `PictureBox1`, and `Button1`, respectively. 程式碼貼入表單，並將產生關聯`Button1_Click`方法，按鈕之事件。Paste the code into the form and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's event. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ImageExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 從指定的資料流，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified data stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須維持資料流開啟的存留期。You must keep the stream open for the lifetime of the . 由於的限制[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]解碼器，建構具有單一維度大於 65,535 個像素的.png 影像檔從點陣圖便會擲回。Due to a limitation of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] decoder, an is thrown if you construct a bitmap from a .png image file with a single dimension greater than 65,535 pixels. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從資料流載入點陣圖。The following code example demonstrates how to load a bitmap from a stream. 這個範例被設計來搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 建立表單，其中包含名為`PictureBox1`。Create a form that contains a named `PictureBox1`. 將程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`InitializeStreamBitmap`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理方法。Paste the code into the form and call the `InitializeStreamBitmap` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.BitmapMembers#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BitmapMembers/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.BitmapMembers#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BitmapMembers/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.BitmapMembers#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BitmapMembers/VB/form1.vb#2)]

span.span: contains a PNG image file with a single dimension greater than 65,535 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檔案名稱和路徑可以相對於應用程式或絕對路徑。The file name and path can be relative to the application or an absolute path. 使用這個建構函式，以開啟下列檔案格式的映像： BMP、 GIF、 EXIF、 JPG、 PNG 和 TIFF。Use this constructor to open images with the following file formats: BMP, GIF, EXIF, JPG, PNG and TIFF. 如需有關支援之格式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 類型的點陣圖](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/types-of-bitmaps.md)。For more information about supported formats, see [Types of Bitmaps](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/types-of-bitmaps.md). 檔案會維持鎖定直到處置。The file remains locked until the is disposed.

span.span: The specified file is not found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會指定型別的命名空間結合資源的字串名稱，並尋找組件資訊清單中的比對。This constructor combines the namespace of the given type with the string name of the resource and looks for a match in the assembly manifest. 比方說您可以傳入型別和`Button.bmp`這個建構函式，它會尋找名為的資源`System.Windows.Forms.Button.bmp`。For example you can pass in the type and `Button.bmp` to this constructor and it will look for a resource named `System.Windows.Forms.Button.bmp`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構點陣圖，以從型別，以及如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to construct a bitmap from a type, and how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，程式碼貼到 Windows 表單上。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form. 處理表單的事件，並呼叫`ConstructFromResourceSaveAsGif`方法，傳遞`e`為 Handle the form’s event and call the `ConstructFromResourceSaveAsGif` method, passing `e` as [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.BmpCtorAndSave#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BmpCtorAndSave/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.BmpCtorAndSave#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BmpCtorAndSave/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.BmpCtorAndSave#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BmpCtorAndSave/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫端會負責配置及釋放指定的記憶體區塊`scan0`參數。The caller is responsible for allocating and freeing the block of memory specified by the `scan0` parameter. 不過，應該不會釋放記憶體直到相關發行。However, the memory should not be released until the related is released. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式。The following code example shows how to use the constructor. 此範例設計來搭配 Windows Form，並需要參數，也就是參數的事件。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms and requires a parameter, which is a parameter of the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用鎖定在系統記憶體的將現有點陣圖，以便以程式設計方式變更的方法。Use the method to lock an existing bitmap in system memory so that it can be changed programmatically. 您可以變更的色彩與影像方法，雖然方法提供較佳的效能，大規模的變更。You can change the color of an image with the method, although the method offers better performance for large-scale changes. 指定的屬性，例如大小、 像素格式、 記憶體中的像素資料的起始位址和長度的每一條掃描線 (stride)。The specifies the attributes of the , such as size, pixel format, the starting address of the pixel data in memory, and length of each scan line (stride). 呼叫此方法時，您應該使用的成員包含特定位元為每像素 (BPP) 值的列舉型別。When calling this method, you should use a member of the enumeration that contains a specific bits-per-pixel (BPP) value. 使用這類值並將會擲回。Using values such as and will throw an . 此外，傳遞點陣圖的不正確的像素格式將會擲回。Also, passing the incorrect pixel format for a bitmap will throw an . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用， ， ，和屬性;並方法，而列舉型別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , , and properties; the and methods; and the enumeration. 這個範例被設計來搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 此範例中不是所有的像素格式中正常運作，而是提供使用方式的範例方法。This example is not designed to work correctly with all pixel formats, but to provide an example of how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，將它貼到 表單和處理的表單藉由呼叫的事件`LockUnlockBitsExample`方法，傳遞`e`做為。To run this example, paste it into a form and handle the form's event by calling the `LockUnlockBitsExample` method, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.BitmapMembers#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BitmapMembers/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.BitmapMembers#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BitmapMembers/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.BitmapMembers#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BitmapMembers/VB/form1.vb#5)]

summary.span: 可讓這個 的預設透明色彩為透明。

span.span: Makes the default transparent color transparent for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 系統調色盤會定義為預設透明的或 alpha 色彩的一種色彩。The system palette defines one color as the default transparent, or alpha, color. 此方法會進行預設透明色彩透明這個。This method makes the default transparent color transparent for this . 如果沒有透明的色彩由系統中，指定是透明的色彩。If no transparent color is specified by the system, is the transparent color. 當您呼叫，將點陣圖轉換成格式，此格式支援 alpha 色板。When you call , the bitmap will be converted to the format, as this format supports an alpha channel. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 程式碼，使系統預設透明色彩清楚了解`myBitmap`，，然後繪製至畫面。The code makes the system default transparent color transparent for `myBitmap`, and then draws the to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples/VB/form1.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的屬性，例如大小、 像素格式、 記憶體中的像素資料的起始位址和長度的每一條掃描線 (stride)。The specifies the attributes of the , such as size, pixel format, the starting address of the pixel data in memory, and length of each scan line (stride). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用， ， ，和屬性;並方法，而列舉型別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , , and properties; the and methods; and the enumeration. 此範例中不是所有的像素格式中正常運作，而是提供使用方式的範例方法。This example is not designed to work correctly with all pixel formats, but to provide an example of how to use the method. 這個範例被設計來搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 若要執行此範例中，將它貼到 表單和處理的表單藉由呼叫的事件`LockUnlockBitsExample`方法，傳遞`e`做為。To run this example, paste it into a form and handle the form's event by calling the `LockUnlockBitsExample` method, passing `e` as .
